sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

revisionDesc.change: Initial TEI transcription from PanGeo Partners, Inc.

body.p: p.2............The Norwegian Tennis-player, Miss Molla Bjurstedt, who holds the American championship; won Womens Single Metropolitan Championship at West Side Club's Courts Friday. Instead of the usual championship title and price Miss Bjurstedt will receive a certificate, issued by United States Lawn Tennis Association, as all the funds of this organization have been donated to the Red Cross.

Miss Bjurstedt defeated Mr. C. B. Hitchins 6 - 3, - 6 - 1, and was superior to her opponents at all times, winning twenty-three sets to Mrs. Hitsen's fourteen. Play for the Double Championship will start Sunday.
